info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 22 at 5:18PM EDT until August 22 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida, including the following county, Madison and south central Georgia, including the following counties, Brooks, Lanier and Lowndes.
* WHEN...Until 745 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 517 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1.5 to 3 inches are possible over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Valdosta, Lake Park, Lakeland, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Valdosta Regional Airport, I-75 At Exit 11, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 22, Twin Lakes, Clyattville, I-75 At Exit 5, Barretts, Blue Springs, Naylor, Nankin, Stockton and Hansell. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT THIS EVENING

area.areaDesc: Madison, FL; Brooks, GA; Lanier, GA; Lowndes, GA
